note.p: Death: His home at Cambridge (05 November 1925)
Education: Exeter Grammar School; St John's College, Cambridge. BA (1875), MA (1878), ScD (1896)
Career: Fellow of Trinity College, Cambridge (1877, re-elected 1885); Lecturer, Trinity College, Cambridge; Lecturer, Cambridge University (1883-1903); Professor of Physiology, Cambridge (1903-1925)
Memberships: Neurological Society of Great Britain (President 1893)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; DSB; Venn
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1927 vol 101 pp xxxiii-xli, plate, by Walter Morley Fletcher
